tool_description: QR code generator API. Dynamically generate QR codes and get an image in multiple formats.
name: QR Code Generator
title: QR Code Generator

api_list.name: Generate Advance - Direct Image
api_list.description: Generates a QR code as a direct image with additional settings. (NOTE: doesn't show correctly in RapidAPI)

api_list.name: Generate Basic - Base64
api_list.description: Generates a QR code as base64 with limited settings.

api_list.name: Generate Advance - Base64
api_list.description: Generates a QR code as base64 with additional settings.

api_list.name: Generate Basic - Direct Image
api_list.description: Generates a QR code as a direct image with limited settings. (NOTE: doesn't show correctly in RapidAPI)
